name: CGA Pumpkin Carver
description:
Have you ever wanted to carve a pumpkin on your computer in full 4-color CGA glory?  No?  Well here you go anyway!

Includes the amazing ability to toggle through 4 CGA palettes to find the perfect colors for your spooOOOoooky Jack-o-lantern!

Don't like the shape of your pumpkin?  Don't worry!  There's 4 shapes to choose from!

Just click/touch the pumpkin to start carving away!

Take screenshots and share your pumpkins in the comments!
